name: Chief Innovation Officer
description: Template for Chief Innovation Officers focusing on emerging technologies, R&D initiatives, disruption opportunities, and innovation culture.

capturePrompts.label: Innovation Area
capturePrompts.prompt: What innovation domain is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., AI/ML, New product category, Business model innovation

capturePrompts.label: Opportunity / Insight
capturePrompts.prompt: What opportunity or insight was discovered?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Market gap, Emerging technology, Customer unmet need

capturePrompts.label: Disruption Potential
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., New market creation, Industry transformation, Incremental improvement

capturePrompts.label: Experimentation Plan
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Prototype, Pilot program, POC with partner

capturePrompts.label: Resource / Investment
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., R&D budget, Talent acquisition, Partnership

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Chief Innovation Officer. Focus on identifying disruptive opportunities, fostering innovation culture, and managing R&D initiatives. Encourage experimentation and learning from failure. Consider long-term strategic impact and competitive differentiation. Balance visionary thinking with practical execution.
